name: Eternal Night (Ashwin K)
description:
DESCRIPTION

ETERNAL NIGHT is a Horror-Survival game set in a post-apocalyptic wasteland, where the world is ravaged by nature’s fury at Mankind’s greed.

This game adopts the First-Person perspective .The player has a pistol and an axe at his disposal. The Player is also capable of crafting Health pills and traps to aid him on his journey. The night is dark and full of terrors. “The Turned” infest the land and have an insatiable appetite for human flesh, but they are not the greatest threat. The Night Prowlers now roam the land and they are the bane of mankind. The Player has his back against the wall. Desperate and the only survivor the player must be strategic and conservative to survive the Eternal Night.

SURVIVAL GUIDE

“The Turned” and relentless and feel no pain Head Shots do more damage than body shots .The Night Prowler that’s stalking you however, is a whole other beast. It is unpredictable and considered Immortal . There is also an active Crafting System The player can Interact with a Crafting table to craft traps health pills or bullets using scrap he got from his kill.
